SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.tui.Printer
public final class Printer extends Object
Printer is a helper class that the TextualUserInterface allows to print the game elements like cards, goals, boards.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Printer.Canvas
    Canvas allows to handles dynamic matrices of characters.
    static enum 
    Printer.TextColor
    Helper enum that helps to map the wanted text color to the code that needs to be added to the string in order to display the color.

  • Method Details

    • printCard

      public static void printCard(Card card, boolean onBackSide)
      Prints the specified side of the given Card.
      Parameters:
      card - card that needs to be printed
      onBackSide - true if the back side of the card is the one that needs to be printed, false otherwise

    • printHand

      public static void printHand(PlayCard[] cards)
      Prints the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      cards - the list of cards that represents the player's hand that needs to be printed

    • printBoard

      public static void printBoard(Map<CardLocation,CardSlot> board, int xOffset, int yOffset)
      Prints the player's board.
      Parameters:
      board - the Board that needs to be printed
      xOffset - the x offset (in terms of cards) of the center of the board's position
      yOffset - the y offset (in terms of cards) of the center of the board's position

    • printDrawableCards

      public static void printDrawableCards(Deck<PlayCard> resourceDeck, Deck<PlayCard> goldDeck, PlayCard[] visibleCards)
      Prints the drawable cards (decks and visible cards)
      Parameters:
      resourceDeck - the resource card deck that needs to be printed
      goldDeck - the gold card deck that needs to be printed
      visibleCards - the visible cards that need to be printed

    • printScoreBoard

      public static void printScoreBoard(ScoreBoard scoreBoard, List<Player> players)
      Prints the scoreboard.
      Parameters:
      scoreBoard - ScoreBoard containing the scores that needs to be placed
      players - the list of players whose score needs to be displayed

    • printChat

      public static void printChat(Chat chat, Player localPlayer, Player remotePlayer)
      Prints a chat.
      Parameters:
      chat - Chat object that contains the messages
      localPlayer - the local Player
      remotePlayer - the remote player whose chat with the local player needs to be placed, null if the public chat needs to printed

    • printGoal

      public static void printGoal(Goal goal)
      Allows to print a textual representation of a game's goal.
      Parameters:
      goal - Goal that needs to be printed
